channel.title: Graphback Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Graphback news and events.

item.title: Using Visitor Pattern to parse GraphQL AST
item.description: GraphQL is a amazing technology which is being adapted more and more. As part of my work for JBoss community in GSoC'19 I have been working on Graphback. For the needs of the project we had to extract information from a schema (SDL syntax) into a nice object we can use. For example, convert this
